code: export var getCurrentUser=function getCurrentUser(){var user=null;try{user=localStorage.getItem('authUser')!=null?JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('authUser')):null;}catch(error){console.log('>>>> getCurrentUser -> error',error);user=null;}return user;};export var setCurrentUser=function setCurrentUser(user){try{if(user){localStorage.setItem('authUser',JSON.stringify(user));}else{localStorage.removeItem('authUser');}}catch(error){console.log('>>>> setCurrentUser -> error',error);}};
